subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova defeated Vera Zvonareva, 6-1, 2-6, 6-0, in the Qatar Open final, improving to 14-0 this season and earning her 18th career title.Sharapova earned $414,000 for the victory, the largest prize on the WTA Tour outside of the Grand Slams.
snippet: Maria Sharapova defeated Vera Zvonareva, 6-1, 2-6, 6-0, in the Qatar Open final, improving to 14-0 this season and earning her 18th career title.Sharapova earned $414,000 for the victory, the largest prize on the WTA Tour outside of the Grand Slams.
